flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in width between where they're starting from and their destination is 80-50 = <<80-50=30>>30 yards
The width increases 2 yards every 10 m along the river so they would have to cover (30/2)*10 = <<(30/2)*10=105>>105 meters
Traveling at the rate of 5m/s, he will spend 105/5 = <<105/5=21>>21 seconds
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 105. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
